topic.title: [Consult] What method did you use to package the program?
topic.body:
Hi, just curious and wanna learn something new.
I saw the `ZeroNet.pkg` file in the released version (win64), which is a new form to me.
Tried to search in the net but cant get any results, just want to know what kind of method did you use to package zeronet and what's inside this `zeronet.pkg` file.
Thanks.

1604067581_mirrored_mo-han_github.body:
Hi,
I've checked the .cmd and .spec files, also learned the "archive" thing on pyinstaller.readthedocs.io, but still have no idea how that "zeronet.pkg" file is generated. Could you please tell me something more about it?
Thanks.
